attributes.action: Abandon road congestion charging, as it will ultimately result in the upturn of price increases, and therefore civil unrest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the Free Nation have a long and generally good association with our Governments. This however will in time to come, prove to be the very worst decision any Goverment could possibly have made.!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
